imdb.plot outline: The Ojekoo series takes us into the lives of a family of four. This family of four consisting of mother, father, son and daughter inhabit a household known as Adjeley fioo We. The series gives us a glimpse of the daily activities and interactions of this family living in Accra, the capital of Ghana. It also serves as an educational piece that focuses on the traditions and customs of the indigenes of the Greater Accra Region. The show is an interesting one full of vibrancy and comedy.
imdb.title: OJEKOO
plot: Ojekoo tv series. Is all about different greetings from Ga dangme trip. The meaning of Ojekoo is good morning. As the rising sun.::Nii Aryee Malcom Aryee

The Ojekoo series takes us into the lives of a family of four. This family of four consisting of mother, father, son and daughter inhabit a household known as Adjeley fioo We. The series gives us a glimpse of the daily activities and interactions of this family living in Accra, the capital of Ghana. It also serves as an educational piece that focuses on the traditions and customs of the indigenes of the Greater Accra Region. The show is an interesting one full of vibrancy and comedy.::NANA DOKUA OBUOBI
